product_name: Sanpellegrino CIAO Peach Sparkling Flavored Water with Real Fruit Juices, 24-Pack
short_description: Enjoy a taste experience like no other with our Sanpellegrino CIAO! Flavored Sparkling Water with blend of peach and citrus juices. We've created something special – Sparkling water with real fruit juice, natural flavors, and a pinch of Sicilian salt to add refreshment to your day. With a legacy spanning over 90 years, Sanpellegrino has mastered the art of creating sparkling beverages that celebrate the Italian zest for life and timeless traditions. Experience our natural peach flavor with a unique blend of peach and citrus juices. Whether you are enjoying a moment of relaxation or entertaining guests, Sanpellegrino CIAO! peach juice/note/aroma adds a touch of Italian elegance to any occasion with only five calories, 0g added sugar and a can that is recyclable and free from caffeine
ingredients: CARBONATED WATER, PEACH JUICE CONCENTRATE, BLOOD ORANGE JUICE CONCENTRATE, LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, NATURAL FLAVORS, SICILIAN SALT, LEMON JUICE.

product_name: Splash Black Cherry Sparkling Water, 12 fl oz, 8 Cans
short_description: Say hello to your new sparkling obsession: Splash Refresher Sparkling water. It's perfectly sweet, bursting with vibrant flavors, and filled with delightful bubbles for a refreshing experience. Just like it's still sibling, Splash Refresher Sparkling is a guilt-free indulgence designed for sparkling water lovers. With 0 calories, 0 sugar, and 0 colors, it’s bubbling with electrolytes to deliver all the flavor and fizz you crave, minus the guilt. Created to make hydration easy and enjoyable, Splash Refresher Sparkling is the deliciously tempting treat you’ll want by your side whenever thirst calls. Whether you’re hitting the gym, powering through your commute, or bringing a fruity burst of flavor to mealtime, these sparkling refreshers are here to add a touch of flavorful fun to your routine. Hydration has never looked—or tasted—so good. It’s water’s big glow-up, and it’s here to keep you refreshed and satisfied all day long. Flavor: Black Cherry. 8 pack of 12oz aluminum cans.
ingredients: Purified Water, Carbon Dioxide, Less than 0.5% of Natural Flavors, Citric Acid (to Preserve Freshness), Magnesium Sulfate, Potassium Sorbate (to Preserve Freshness), Potassium Benzoate (to Preserve Freshness), Sucralose, Calcium Disodium EDTA, Zinc Sulfate.

short_description: Like vacation sun warming your face, Island Punch is pure escapism. Love at first sip: you’re met first with tart and tangy passion fruit, followed by a bright hint of juicy orange, complemented by a sweet pink guava finish. One of our fuller-bodied flavors, Island Punch is a complex combination with the perfect balance of sweetness and acidity that’s so good you’ll go back for more.

Sparkling Ice Cherry Limeade is a fizzy, flavorful sparkling water, without all the calories. Sparkling Ice Cherry Limeade flavored sparkling water contains 0g sugar, only 5 calories per bottle, and 0g carbs. Made with better-for-you ingredients, this low-calorie carbonated water is bursting with real fruit flavor, is made with colors from natural sources, and contains vitamins and antioxidants. Enjoy Sparkling Ice as a mocktail or mix it with your drink of choice for a delicious, low calorie cocktail. The product ships in a pack of 12 bottles. Each sparkling water bottle contains 17 fl oz.

product_name: Sanpellegrino Italian Sparkling Drink Pompelmo, Sparkling Grapefruit Beverage, 6 Pack of 11.5 Fl Oz Cans
short_description: Enjoy every sparkling moment with a Sanpellegrino Pompelmo Italian Sparkling Drink. Sanpellegrino Pompelmo is a grapefruit flavored sparkling beverage made with Mediterranean grapefruit containing real grapefruit juice (11% juice from concentrate), sugar and other natural flavors to add a refreshing alternative to traditional seltzer water, flavored sparkling water or carbonated soft drinks. With deliciously sweet tartness, this flavored sparkling beverage is made with no artificial sweeteners. Smooth on the palate, Sanpellegrino Pompelmo is a delicately balanced drink with fresh and tart notes, with the perfect sweet touch to end. Enjoy Sanpellegrino Pompelmo as a refreshing morning drink, a tasty mid-afternoon treat or while you unwind at the end of the day. Serve this flavored sparkling beverage chilled, and garnish with a slice of grapefruit or mint for an expert finish. Whatever the occasion, take the time for taste with Sanpellegrino Italian sparkling drinks.

product_name: Waterloo Sparkling Water, Strawberry, 12 fl oz, 24 Pack Cans
short_description:
Coast-to-Coast Strawberry

Waterloo Strawberry Sparkling Water is playful, bright, and refreshing. This flavored sparkling water is made with a complex flavor profile worthy of the best strawberries in the land. Our inspiration came from the strawberries in Florida and California. To date, one of the hardest flavor to get right with 100 different iterations over nine months of twists and turns, we combined seedy notes with the true-to-fruit perfectly ripe and juicy notes. And we added a nod to the Swedish marine-shaped candy to elevate the delightfulness factor. Like all Waterloo Sparkling Water flavors, it has zero calories, zero sugar or sweeteners of any kind, and zero sodium to support healthy, active lifestyles.

short_description: What happens when two fruity, juicy worlds collide? You get a new Sparkling Ice® flavor packed with all the mouthwatering juiciness of STARBURST® fruit chew candies. Introducing Sparkling Ice STARBURST TM , available in classic STARBURST® flavor Cherry. Sparkling Ice® is a fizzy, fruity, sparkling water made with zero sugar, a splash of real juice, colors from natural sources, plus vitamins and antioxidants. It’s the better-for-you beverage that tastes great, too. And there’s a flavor for everyone. This classic trio of cherry, orange, and pineapple is the Fruit Punch that packs a punch. Allergens Not Contained.

short_description: Sparkling ICE Coconut Pineapple Sparkling Water 17 fl oz Plastic Bottle. Allergens not contained. Sparkling Ice® is a fizzy, fruity, sparkling water made with zero sugar, a splash of real juice, colors from natural sources, plus vitamins and antioxidants. It’s the better-for-you beverage that tastes great, too. And, there’s a flavor for everyone. Rich coconut mingles with tropical pineapple in this Coconut Pineapple paradise. You may not be sitting on the beach, but with tropical pineapple and tantalizing coconut, a mini umbrella would be totally appropriate. Sparkling ICE Coconut Pineapple Sparkling Water is a flavored sparkling water that combines the tropical taste of coconut and pineapple. It is part of the Sparkling ICE brand, known for its zero-calorie, carbonated beverages with a variety of fruit flavors. This drink typically contains no caffeine, has vitamins and antioxidants, and uses artificial sweeteners like sucralose to maintain its sweetness without added sugar.

product_name: Tru Defense Seltzer, Sparkling Water with Vitamin C, Ginger Extract, Cayenne Pepper & Real Pineapple Juice, Sweetened with Monk Fruit & Stevia, Gluten Free, Vegan, Caffeine Free, 12 FL OZ Cans, 12 Pa
short_description: Tru Defense Seltzer is a naturally flavored sparkling water crafted with real pineapple juice, vitamin C, ginger extract, and cayenne pepper. Each 12 oz can contains only 10 calories and 2g of sugar, making it a flavorful, fruit-forward alternative to sugary energy drinks or flavored sodas. This caffeine free drink is sweetened with monk fruit and stevia — no sucralose or artificial ingredients—making it a clean, everyday option. Whether you’re sipping it straight from the fridge or cracking one open during your preworkout routine, Tru Defense delivers light carbonation and bold pineapple flavor with every sip. It's gluten free, vegan, keto friendly, and made for on the go hydration. Each can is shelf-stable and travel-ready, perfect for gym bags, office coolers, or casual sipping throughout the day. Looking for more flavor options? Explore the full Tru lineup with functional sparkling waters like Tru Refresh, Tru Focus, and Tru Glow—each one offering its own twist on hydration with real fruit juice and thoughtfully selected ingredients.

product_name: Splash Blood Orange Sparkling Water, 12 fl oz, 8 Cans
short_description: Say hello to your new sparkling obsession: Splash Refresher Sparkling water. It's perfectly sweet, bursting with vibrant flavors, and filled with delightful bubbles for a refreshing experience. Just like it's still sibling, Splash Refresher Sparkling is a guilt-free indulgence designed for sparkling water lovers. With 0 calories, 0 sugar, and 0 colors, it’s bubbling with electrolytes to deliver all the flavor and fizz you crave, minus the guilt. Created to make hydration easy and enjoyable, Splash Refresher Sparkling is the deliciously tempting treat you’ll want by your side whenever thirst calls. Whether you’re hitting the gym, powering through your commute, or bringing a fruity burst of flavor to mealtime, these sparkling refreshers are here to add a touch of flavorful fun to your routine. Hydration has never looked—or tasted—so good. It’s water’s big glow-up, and it’s here to keep you refreshed and satisfied all day long. Flavor: Blood Orange. 8 pack of 12oz aluminum cans.

product_name: Tru Refresh Seltzer, Sparkling Water with Electrolytes, Prickly Pear, Lemon Balm & Real Blackberry Juice, Sweetened with Monk Fruit & Stevia, Gluten Free, Vegan, Caffeine Free, 12 FL OZ Cans, 12 Pack
short_description: Tru Refresh Seltzer is a lightly sparkling beverage crafted with real blackberry juice, prickly pear extract, and lemon balm for a uniquely crisp and flavorful experience. Each 12 oz can contains just 10 calories and 1g of sugar, delivering clean hydration with a touch of real fruit. Made without caffeine, Tru Refresh is designed to be enjoyed by anyone, anytime — whether you’re looking for an energy drink alternative, a sparkling water with more flavor, or just something refreshing and fizzy to sip. This drink is gluten free, vegan, kosher, and made without lactose, sucralose, or artificial dyes. Sweetened with a blend of monk fruit and stevia, Tru Refresh skips the sugar overload while still tasting naturally delicious. The addition of electrolytes makes it a smart companion for busy days, casual workouts, or late-night rehydration. Packaged in sleek, shelf-stable 12 oz cans, Tru Refresh is ideal for tossing in a gym bag, cooler, or lunch tote. Whether you’re swapping out soda or stocking your fridge with something new, Tru brings hydration with real flavor.
ingredients: Carbonated Water, Erythritol, Blackberry Juice Concentrate, Natural Flavor, Citric Acid, Maltodextrin, Prickly Pear Extract, Potassium Citrate, Stevia Extract (Steviol Glycosides), Monk Fruit Extract, Sea Salt, Lemon Balm Extract.

  • FLAVOR YOU CAN TASTE This isn’t one of those hint-of-flavor sparkling waters. This is major flavor that will fruit up your taste buds

An irresistible blend of luscious strawberry and vibrant kiwi flavor. They go together so perfectly, we’re surprised Mother Nature didn’t come up with it first. Each can blends real cherry juice with a relaxing combination of chamomile, GABA, and magnesium — delivering 10 calories, 1g of sugar, and no artificial sweeteners. Lightly carbonated and naturally sweetened with monk fruit and stevia, it offers a fruity cherry berry taste that's refreshing without overpowering your senses. Whether you're winding down after a long day or simply choosing a lighter drink to enjoy on the couch, Tru Dream fits effortlessly into your routine. This cherry berry sparkling water is keto friendly, vegan, OU Kosher, gluten free, and contains no artificial colors or caffeine. Packaged in a 12 oz shelf-stable can, Tru Dream makes it easy to take your beverage routine to a new level—at home, on the go, or anywhere in between. Explore the full Tru lineup including functional favorites like Focus, Glow, and Defense for flavorful variety that brings fizz and function to every moment.
ingredients: Carbonated Water Water, Sour Cherry Juice Concentrate, Erythritol, Citric Acid, Gamma Amino Butyric Acid, L-5-Hydroxytryptophan, Magnesium, Stevia Leaf Extract, Monkfruit Extract, Natural Flavor, Chamomile Extract, and Melatonin.

product_name: San Pellegrino Pomegranate & Orange Sparkling Fruit Beverage 11 oz Cans - Pack of 24
short_description: Melograno e Arancia is a beverage made with the juices of delicious oranges and pomegranate. It has a strong aroma of pomegranate combined with a delicate taste of orange to create a fresh tartness and a finish tending toward sweetness. Revitalizing flavors that truly embrace the bubbly, breezy, carefree lifestyle of Italy. The refreshing taste of this beverage comes from a delicate mix of pomegranate & orange. Each bottle contains 140 calories. These 11 Oz cans come in a pack of 24.
ingredients: Water, Orange Juice From Concentrate, Sugar, Pomegranate Juice From Concentrate, Carbon Dioxide, Black Carrot (For Color), Natural Flavors, Citric Acid.

product_name: (4 Box) Sanpellegrino CIAO Lime Sparkling Flavored Water with Real Fruit Juices, 6 Pack
short_description: Enjoy a taste experience like no other with our Sanpellegrino CIAO! Lime Flavored Sparkling Water. We've created something special – Sparkling water with real fruit juice, natural flavors, and a pinch of Sicilian salt to add refreshment to your day. With a legacy spanning over 90 years, Sanpellegrino has mastered the art of creating sparkling beverages that celebrate the Italian zest for life and timeless traditions. Experience our natural lime flavor with a unique blend of lime and citrus juices. Whether you are enjoying a moment of relaxation or entertaining guests, Sanpellegrino CIAO! Lime adds a touch of Italian elegance to any occasion with only five calories, 0g added sugar and a can that is recyclable and free from caffeine
ingredients: CARBONATED WATER, LIME JUICE CONCENTRATE, ORANGE JUICE CONCENTRATE, LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, NATURAL FLAVORS, SICILIAN SALT, LEMON JUICE, ORANGE EXTRACT.

product_name: Sparkling Ice® Naturally Flavored Sparkling Water, Pink Grapefruit 17 fl oz Plastic Bottle (Pack of 4)
short_description: Sparkling Ice® is a fizzy and flavorful sparkling water—without all the calories. Try Pink Grapefruit and enjoy a subtly sweet and tangy flavor that tastes fresh off the tree. (Without, you know, having to climb a tree). Take the sweet-meets-tart flavor on the go, wherever you go. Sparkling Ice® Pink Grapefruit is a fruity, flavorful sparkling water made with zero sugar, vitamins and antioxidants, and only 5 calories per serving.

product_name: Polar Zero Calorie Black Cherry Sparkling Seltzer Water, 12 fl oz, 8 Pack Cans
short_description: Black Cherry Polar Seltzer offers a satisfying balance of sweet and tart aromas that will keep you refreshed year round.Polar Seltzer Premium Sparkling Water. Tiny Bubbles: The sparkle sets us apart. We've been perfecting the process of making our signature bubbles, with their long-lasting carbonation and crispness, since 1882. The bubbles are created by carefully dissolving Co2 into water at high pressure and freezing temperatures without exposing the flavors to oxygen. Other people may add sodium or sweeteners to shortcut the road to quality – we do not. Natural Flavors: The taste of our seltzers is defined by the quality ingredients of the ingredients we used. Our approach is to use only the highest-quality, proprietary combinations of flavors and aromas for depth and complexity. These ingredients are extracted and distilled from natural sources (such as lemon peel, lime, mint, etc.) to create highly concentrated “essences”. Relying on copious amounts of these very precious oils, we never skimp when it comes to taste. Triple-Filtered & Locally Sourced Water: Our water is locally sourced and then triple-filtered with our state-of-the-art process to ensure a consistent and authentic Polar Seltzer taste. NO sodium, fluoride, or other funny business added. This is why Polar Seltzer makes for health-smart hydration. Family Made Since 1882: Just water, zillions of tiny bubbles, and great taste. Our family has been crafting Polar Seltzer with these same ingredients since 1882. That’s 138 years to perfect what our great-great-grandfather called the world’s best-tasting bubble recipe. At Polar Beverages we work hard to keep things uncomplicated, refreshing and endlessly creative. Take a sip, and let us know.

product_name: San Pellegrino Grapefruit Sparkling Fruit Beverage 11 oz Cans - Pack of 24
short_description: San Pelligrino has been setting the standards for high quality w-a-t-e-rs from their native Italy for generations. Now Pelligrino is broadening their horizons with a new line of sparkling fruit beverages. Try this Sparkling Grapefruit Fruit Beverage in its 11 oz can and let us know what you think! This San Pelligrino Fruit Beverage comes in a pack of twenty four 11 oz cans.

product_name: Sanpellegrino Italian Sparkling Drink Aranciata Rossa, Sparkling Orange and Blood Orange Beverage, 24 Pack of Cans 267.6 fl oz
short_description: Enjoy every sparkling moment with Sanpellegrino Arcanciata Rossa Sparkling Drink. Sanpellegrino Aranciata Rossa is an orange and blood orange flavored sparkling beverage made with Italian oranges containing real orange and blood orange juice (10% orange juice and 5% blood orange from concentrate), sugar, and other natural ﬂavors to add a refreshing alternative to traditional seltzer water, flavored sparkling water or carbonated soft drinks. Deliciously bright and tangy, this ﬂavored sparkling beverage is made with no artiﬁcial sweeteners. Smooth on the palate, Sanpellegrino Aranciata Rossa is a delicately balanced drink with fresh and tangy notes, with the perfect sweet touch to end. Enjoy Sanpellegrino Aranciata Rossa as a refreshing sparkling drink, a tasty mid-afternoon treat, or while you unwind at the end of the day. Serve this sparkling ﬂavored beverage chilled, and garnish with fresh orange slices or cherries for an expert ﬁnish. Whatever the occasion, take the time for taste with Sanpellegrino Italian sparkling drinks.
ingredients: INGREDIENTS: WATER, SUGAR, ORANGE JUICE CONCENTRATE, BLOOD ORANGE JUICE CONCENTRATE, CARBON DIOXIDE, ORANGE EXTRACT, CITRIC ACID, BLACK CARROT EXTRACT (FOR COLOR), PECTIN, NATURAL FLAVORS, PAPRIKA EXTRACT (FOR COLOR).
